about_the_game: Michael arrives in Berlin to visit his ex-girlfriend Gabi, when a terrible virus spreads across the city, turning ordinary people into mindless homicidal maniacs. Trapped in his girlfriend's flat, he teams up with Harper, a teenage plumber, as hordes of infected zombies begin to swarm the building.  The unlikely duo must escape the infested building, outwit the undead and find Gabi before its too late.  Rammbock is an unlikely tale of love, terror, and survival set against the dystopian backdrop of a zombie-infested Berlin.

Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Michael arrives in Berlin to visit his ex-girlfriend Gabi, when a terrible virus spreads across the city, turning ordinary people into mindless homicidal maniacs. Trapped in his girlfriend's flat, he teams up with Harper, a teenage plumber, as hordes of infected zombies begin to swarm the building. The unlikely duo must escape the infested building, outwit the undead and find Gabi before its too late. Rammbock is an unlikely tale of love, terror, and survival set against the dystopian backdrop of a zombie-infested Berlin.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
